name: Alexandra Chen
summary: Senior Data Analyst with 4 years of experience in e-commerce. Skilled in R for data analysis and visualization, driving strategic decision-making through actionable insights.

experience.title: Lead Data Analyst
experience.description: Led a team in analyzing customer behavior data, resulting in a 15% increase in conversion rates. Developed predictive models to optimize marketing strategies.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Performed A/B testing on website features, leading to a 20% improvement in user engagement. Implemented data-driven pricing strategies, increasing revenue by 10%.

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Analysis
projects.description: Segmented customer base using clustering algorithms in R, resulting in targeted marketing campaigns and a 12% increase in customer retention.

projects.name: Sales Forecasting Dashboard
projects.description: Built interactive dashboard in R Shiny to visualize sales trends, aiding in forecasting accuracy and reducing inventory costs by 8%.
